content.en: Oscillation analysis: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to address the challenges of analyzing low-frequency oscillations in power systems. These algorithms integrate multiple techniques, such as Ensemble Empirical Mode Decomposition (EEMD), Prony algorithm, wavelet transform, matrix pencil, and more, to improve the accuracy, noise resistance, and computing speed of identifying oscillation modes and parameters. By combining these algorithms with advanced signal processing methods, researchers aim to monitor and analyze low-frequency oscillations in power systems with increasing complexity and high penetration of renewable energy sources.
content.da: Svingningsanalyse: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer til at imødegå udfordringerne ved analyse af lavfrekvente svingninger i elnet. Disse algoritmer integrerer flere teknikker, såsom Ensemble Empirical Mode Decomposition (EEMD), Prony-algoritme, wavelet-transform, matrix pencil og mere, for at forbedre nøjagtigheden, støjmodstanden og beregningshastigheden ved identifikation af svingningstilstande og parametre. Ved at kombinere disse algoritmer med avancerede signalbehandlingsmetoder sigter forskere mod at overvåge og analysere lavfrekvente svingninger i elnet med stigende kompleksitet og høj gennemtrængning af vedvarende energikilder.
